Post.title: Hexoyilia() -
Post._content:
Hexo+GitHub/Gitee ## 1.Hexo > node ```bash npm install hexo-cli -g npm install hexo-deployer-git --save # git ``` ## 2.yilia > git ### 2.1. ```bash git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git themes/yilia # hexo-theme-yiliathemes ``` > [hexo-theme-yilia-plus](https://github.com/JoeyBling/hexo-theme-yilia-plus) yilia JoeyBling ### 2.2.yilia [hexo-theme-yilia-plus](https://github.com/JoeyBling/hexo-theme-yilia-plus)_config.yml `theme` , ```yaml # Extensions ## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/ ## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/ # theme: landscape # theme: yilia-plus # yilia ``` ```yaml # Site title: '' # subtitle: '' # description: '' # keywords: '' author: '' # language: zh-CN # timezone: '' # Hexo ``` ## 3. > ```bash npm i hexo-generator-json-content --save ``` `_config.yml`, ```yaml # jsonContent: meta: false pages: false posts: title: true date: true path: true text: false raw: false content: false slug: false updated: false comments: false link: false permalink: false excerpt: false categories: false tags: true ``` ## 4. > `_config.yml` ```yaml # highlight: enable: true line_number: true auto_detect: true tab_replace: '' wrap: true hljs: false ``` ## 5. > `source` `source` `img` `themes\yilia-plus\_config.yml`, ```yaml # favicon: /img/favicon.ico # url avatar: /img/avatar.jpg # alipay: /img/alipay.jpg # weixin: /img/weixin.png ``` ## 6. > `themes\yilia\layout\_partial\left-col.ejs` ```
    <% for (var i in theme.menu){ %>
  • <%= i %>
    • <%}%>
``` ```
<%=site.posts.length%>
``` ## 7. > `git bash` `cmd` : ```bash hexo new page tags # hexo new page categories # ``` `scaffolds\post.md` ```markdown tags: categories: ``` ## 8. > hexo-wordcount, npm install hexo-wordcount --save `themes\yilia\layout\_partial\left-col.ejs` ```
<%= totalcount(site, '0,0.0a') %>
``` `themes\yilia\layout\_partial\article.ejs`header ```
<%= wordcount(post.content) %> | <%= min2read(post.content) %>
``` ## 9.- > `themes\yilia\layout\_partial\after-footer.ejs` ``` ``` ### 9.1. > `themes\yilia\layout\_partial\footer.ejs` ``` # | # ``` ### 9.2. `\themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\post\date.ejs` ``` ``` ## 10.GitHub/Gitee > `GitHub/Gitee pages` `_config.yml` `deploy` ```yaml # Deployment ## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html deploy: type: git # repository: https://gitee.com//blog.git repository: git@gitee.com:/blog.git branch: master ``` > `GitHub/Gitee` `GitHub/Gitee pages` `master` `Git bash` `DOS` ```bash hexo deploy # GitHub/Gitee `npm install hexo-deployer-git --save` ``` ## 11.Hexo ### 11.1. ```bash hexo new "postName" # hexo new page "pageName" # hexo generate #public hexo server --port==8000 #4000`ctrl + c` hexo server -help hexo deploy # `.deploy_git` GitHub/Gitee ``` ### 11.2 ```bash hexo deploy -g hexo server -g ``` ### 11.3. ```bash hexo n == hexo new hexo g == hexo generate hexo s -p 8000 == hexo server --port=8000 hexo d == hexo deploy ``` ---

Post.title: Hexoyilia() -
Post._content:
`` `hexo-yilia` [hexo-theme-yilia-plus](https://github.com/JoeyBling/hexo-theme-yilia-plus) ## hexoDisqusGitmentgitalkutterancesGiteementvaline hexo - **1gitment** GitHub issue[](https://www.jianshu.com/p/ac7658cc912f) - **2gitalk** : GitHub issue[gitalk](https://github.com/gitalk/gitalk) - **3utterance** : GitHub issue[](https://utteranc.es) - **4giteement** : [](https://gitee.com/zhousiwei/giteement) - **5valine** : valine [leancloud](https://leancloud.cn/dashboard/login.html#/signup) ## 1.Gitment > [OAuth Application](https://github.com/settings/applications/new)
`Client ID/scerct` `themes\yilia-plus\_config.yml` , ```yaml gitment_owner: '' # GitHub ID (github ) # js(falsejsjs) gitment_repo: 'xxx.github.io' # repo name(Github) gitment_oauth: client_id: '' #client ID client_secret: '' #client secret ``` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\post` `gitment.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\article.ejs` `gitment` ## 2.Gitalk ### 2.1. `gitalk.ejs` `gitment` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\post` `gitalk.ejs` ```
``` ### 2.2. `comment.scss` `themes\yilia\source-src\css\comment.scss` ```css #disqus_thread, .duoshuo, .cloud-tie-wrapper, #SOHUCS, #gitment-ctn, #gitalk-container { padding: 0 30px !important; min-height: 20px; } #SOHUCS { #SOHU_MAIN .module-cmt-list .block-cont-gw { border-bottom: 1px dashed #c8c8c8 !important; } } ``` ### 2.3. `_config.yml` `themes\yilia-plus\_config.yml` , ```yaml gitalk: enable: true githubID: '' # githubID repo: '' # ClientID: '' # `gitment` ClientSecret: '' # adminUser: '' # GitHubID distractionFreeMode: true ``` ### 2.4. `article.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\article.ejs` ```javascript <% if(theme.gitalk.enable){ %> <%- partial('post/gitalk', { key: post.slug, title: post.title, url: config.url+url_for(post.path) }) %> <% } %> ``` ## 3.Utterance ### 3.1.Utteranceissues `Utterance` [install utterances](https://github.com/apps/utterances) ### 3.2.fork `GitHub` fork [Utterance](https://github.com/utterance/utterances) **`SITES.md`** ### 3.3. `_config.yml` `themes\yilia-plus\_config.yml` , ```yaml # utteranc https://utteranc.es () gitmentgitalk utterance: enable: true repo: 'yaojusheng.github.io' #,ID/blog/utterance_repo issue_term: 'title' # theme: 'github-light' # ``` ### 3.4. `article.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\article.ejs` ``` <% if (theme.utterance && theme.utterance.enable){ %>
<% } %> ``` ## 4.Giteement > GitHub ### 4.1. `giteement.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\post` `giteement.ejs` ``` <% if (!index && post.comments && theme.giteement && theme.giteement.enable){ %>
<% if (theme.giteement && theme.giteement.remote){ %> <% } else { %> <% } %> <% } %> ``` ### 4.2. `_config.yml` `themes\yilia-plus\_config.yml` , ```yaml giteement: enable: true # # js(false) remote: false redirect_uri: '' # () # (https://github.com/Rob--W/cors-anywhere) oauth_uri: https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/https://gitee.com/oauth/token giteeID: '' # # repo repo: yilia-plus-demo gitment_oauth: client_id: '*********' #client ID client_secret: '*********' #client secret ``` ### 4.3. `article.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\article.ejs` ```javascript <% if (theme.giteement && theme.giteement.enable){ %> <%- partial('post/giteement', { key: post.slug, title: post.title, url: config.url+url_for(post.path) }) %> <% } %> ``` ## 5.Valine ### 5.1. `LeanCloud` [leancloud](https://leancloud.cn/dashboard/login.html#/signup) -keys `AppID` `AppKey` ### 5.2. 1. Leancloud -`https://github.com/DesertsP/Valine-Admin.git` 2. 3. master [Valine](https://deserts.io/valine-admin-document/) ### 5.3. `valine.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\post` `valine.ejs` ```
``` ### 5.4. `_config.yml` `themes\yilia-plus\_config.yml` , ```yaml # valine leancloud # https://leancloud.cn/dashboard/login.html#/signup valine: appid: '' # LeancloudappId appkey: '' # LeancloudappKey verify: false # notify: true # avatar: mm # https://valine.js.org/avatar placeholder: ~ # ``` ### 5.5. `article.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\article.ejs` ``` <% if (theme.valine && theme.valine.appid && theme.valine.appkey){ %>
<%- partial('post/valine', { key: post.slug, title: post.title, url: config.url+url_for(post.path) }) %>
<% } %> ``` ---

<% } %> ``` ## 4.Giteement > GitHub ### 4.1. `giteement.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\post` `giteement.ejs` ``` <% if (!index && post.comments && theme.giteement && theme.giteement.enable){ %>
<% if (theme.giteement && theme.giteement.remote){ %> <% } else { %> <% } %> <% } %> ``` ### 4.2. `_config.yml` `themes\yilia-plus\_config.yml` , ```yaml giteement: enable: true # # js(false) remote: false redirect_uri: '' # () # (https://github.com/Rob--W/cors-anywhere) oauth_uri: https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/https://gitee.com/oauth/token giteeID: '' # # repo repo: yilia-plus-demo gitment_oauth: client_id: '*********' #client ID client_secret: '*********' #client secret ``` ### 4.3. `article.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\article.ejs` ```javascript <% if (theme.giteement && theme.giteement.enable){ %> <%- partial('post/giteement', { key: post.slug, title: post.title, url: config.url+url_for(post.path) }) %> <% } %> ``` ## 5.Valine ### 5.1. `LeanCloud` [leancloud](https://leancloud.cn/dashboard/login.html#/signup) -keys `AppID` `AppKey` ### 5.2. 1. Leancloud -`https://github.com/DesertsP/Valine-Admin.git` 2. 3. master [Valine](https://deserts.io/valine-admin-document/) ### 5.3. `valine.ejs` `themes\yilia-plus\layout\_partial\post` `valine.ejs` ```

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

<!-- more -->
## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

<!-- more -->
## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
